titleStmt.title: Obiections against the vse of the bovv vvith the pike: and the answers thereunto
titleStmt.author: Neade, William.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Neade by STC (2nd ed.).
Identified as part of STC 18416 on UMI microfilm 1321.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Harvard University. Library.
Appears at reel 1321 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1837 (Harvard University. Library copy).
Item at reel 1321:5b with: The double-armed man, by the new invention / by W.N. archer. [London] : Printed for I. Grismand ..., 1625.
